英文法規名稱: Fee-charging Standard for the Health Risk Assessment Review of Designated Tobacco Products
中文法規名稱: 指定菸品健康風險評估審查收費標準

法規內容.條文內容: This standard is enacted in accordance with Article 10 of the Charges And Fees Act.
Operators applying for health risk assessments of designated tobacco products shall pay a fee of NTD 2 million for each application case.
The standard shall be enforced on the date of promulgation.
